1183340.name: [it's possible] Soundtrack by Jordan Gardner
1183340.description:
The awesome music of [it's possible] from the mind of Jordan Gardner. All profits go directly to the artist.

Buy now, get all future content

If the game gets new songs, they'll be added to this pack and the price will most likely be raised. Buy early to get access to all future songs at a lower price!

Currently in the pack

  • Theme - "Mind the Spikes"
  • Level editor orchestral - "OSHA Compliant"

This DLC serves only the most badass raw and uncompressed song files. Currently includes the above songs in the WAV audio format.
